pageTitle: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau speaks with the Secretary General of the Organisation Internationale de la Francophonie, the Right Honourable Michaëlle Jean | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Prime Minister Justin Trudeau spoke today with the Secretary General of the Organisation Internationale de la Francophonie, the Right Honourable Michaëlle Jean.

The Prime Minister noted Canada’s longstanding support for both Francophonie values and institutions. He also stressed Canada’s commitment to helping to ensure the success of the upcoming Francophonie Summit, which is scheduled to take place this November in Madagascar.
